articles.author: Noe Padilla
articles.title: Escaped chimp back in enclosure; no injuries reported, Indianapolis Zoo confirms - IndyStar
articles.description: About 10:10 a.m. the Indianapolis Fire Department was dispatched to the zoo for an "animal bite" call. People visiting the zoo say a chimpanzee is loose.
articles.content:
(This article will update.)
A chimpanzee that escaped its enclosure has been recaptured, the Indianapolis Zoo has confirmed.
Indianapolis fire crews were called to the zoo in response to an "animal… [+1594 chars]
